body_html: Well this makes the semantics of requires_grad yet more complicated than they are now, because there's an extra way you can affect them at a distance, and it's much more complicated than a no_grad mode - it's not only checking a global flag, but if a Variable is a leaf or not, and if it is a leaf, then if it is in the "want grad" set. I don't think it's worth the complexity.

body: Well this makes the semantics of `requires_grad` yet more complicated than they are now, because there's an extra way you can affect them at a distance, and it's much more complicated than a `no_grad` mode - it's not only checking a global flag, but if a Variable is a leaf or not, and if it is a leaf, then if it is in the "want grad" set. I don't think it's worth the complexity.
